013    package net.sf.oval.constraint;
014    
015    import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
016    
017    import java.util.Map;
018    
019    import net.sf.oval.Validator;
020    import net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation.AbstractAnnotationCheck;
021    import net.sf.oval.context.OValContext;
022    
023    /**
024     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
025     */
026    public class MinLengthCheck extends AbstractAnnotationCheck<MinLength>
027    {
028            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
029    
030            private int min;
031    
032            /**
033             * {@inheritDoc}
034             */
035            @Override
036            public void configure(final MinLength constraintAnnotation)
037            {
038                    super.configure(constraintAnnotation);
039                    setMin(constraintAnnotation.value());
040            }
041    
042            /**
043             * @return the min
044             */
045            public int getMin()
046            {
047                    return min;
048            }
049    
050            /**
051             * {@inheritDoc}
052             */
053            public boolean isSatisfied(final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
054                            final Validator validator)
055            {
056                    if (valueToValidate == null) return true;
057    
058                    final int len = valueToValidate.toString().length();
059                    return len >= min;
060            }
061    
062            /**
063             * @param min the min to set
064             */
065            public void setMin(final int min)
066            {
067                    this.min = min;
068                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
069            }
070    
071            /**
072             * {@inheritDoc}
073             */
074            @Override
075            public Map<String, String> createMessageVariables()
076            {
077                    final Map<String, String> messageVariables = getCollectionFactory().createMap(2);
078                    messageVariables.put("min", Integer.toString(min));
079                    return messageVariables;
080            }
081    }
